A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was an absolute insult to Star Wars and to the very fans who made Star Wars what it is today\, the FANS ARE STAR WARS\, our money helped make these films what they are\, now the fans have been insulted with this blasphemous film\, it is an outrage! And the treatment of the old characters was disgraceful. Those involved in the writing and making of this film should be ashamed of themselves. RIP Star Wars.
